main event: Witnesses observed an unidentified object in the sky over San Antonio, Texas, with multiple reports detailing various characteristics, lengths of observation, and shapes.
interesting points: The object was described as oblong and white, observed for 30 minutes on August 5, 2023., Another report described a reddish-brown light larger than a star with erratic motion for 10 minutes., Some objects were reported to appear triangular and pulsating before disappearing rapidly., Observations from different incidents indicate no sound from the objects and no visible trails or smoke., A military radar confirmed a sighting of a balloon-like object at 6000 feet on the same date.
sighted object: Various shapes including oblong white object, reddish-brown light, and triangular shape
witness description: Civilians and a military radar observer
